summary: This document consists of multiple photo sheet forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center's Special Investigative Section, documenting a possible suicide attempt by inmate Jeffrey Epstein on July 23, 2019, at 1:27 AM in the Special Housing Unit. The forms indicate photographs were taken by a Lieutenant at 1:45 AM and 2:25 AM, with some forms referencing a 'cellmate'.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The inmate who was the subject of a possible suicide attempt at the Metropolitan Correctional Center on July 23, 2019. Listed with register number #76318-054.

persons.name: Lieutenant
persons.context: The unnamed Lieutenant from the Metropolitan Correctional Center who took the photographs of the incident scene and the cellmate.

connections.description: The Lieutenant was the officer who documented the possible suicide attempt incident involving inmate Epstein.

events.title: Possible Suicide Attempt by Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: A possible suicide attempt involving inmate Jeffrey Epstein occurred at 1:27 AM in the Special Housing Unit of the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.

events.title: Photographic Documentation of Incident
events.description: A Lieutenant from the MCC's Special Investigative Section took photographs of the incident scene at 1:45 AM and, on some forms, of a cellmate at 2:25 AM.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center, New York, N.Y.
Special Housing Unit, Metropolitan Correctional Center
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was involved in a documented 'Possible Suicide Attempt' on July 23, 2019, at 1:27 AM while incarcerated at the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York.
The incident occurred in the Special Housing Unit (SHU), a high-security section of the prison.
The incident was formally documented by the prison's Special Investigative Section using standardized photo sheet forms.
Several forms reference a 'Cellmate' in relation to the incident, indicating another inmate was present or involved.
This documented incident occurred approximately three weeks before Epstein's death by suicide in the same facility on August 10, 2019.
